course_description: Master Python fundamentals through hands-on coding exercises. Learn syntax, data structures, and problem-solving techniques to build real-world applications from day one. Perfect for absolute beginners starting their programming journey.
course_overview: This comprehensive course covers Python installation, core syntax, variables, data types, control structures (loops, conditionals), functions, error handling, and file operations. Through interactive labs and mini-projects, students will develop debugging skills and learn to write clean, efficient code. Final projects include building a number guessing game and a text-based data analyzer, providing practical experience for automation or data science pathways.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no coding experience, career changers entering tech fields, and professionals seeking automation skills for office tasks.
learning_outcomes: Write executable Python scripts using correct syntax and indentation
Implement loops and conditionals to solve computational problems
Create reusable functions with parameters and return values
Manipulate strings, lists, and dictionaries for data processing
Handle common runtime errors using try-except blocks
Read from and write to text files programmatically
